recipes.title: Creamy Pasta Delight
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente.
Prepare creamy sauce in a large skillet.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, cheese, and pepper.
Reserve 1 cup of pasta cooking water before draining.
Add the hot, drained pasta to the skillet.
Remove from heat and quickly add the egg mixture, tossing constantly.
Add pasta water gradually if needed to achieve the right consistency.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.

recipes.title: Creamy Fettuccine
instructions: Cook fettuccine according to package directions
Heat cream and butter in a large pan
Add cooked pasta to the cream mixture
Toss with cheese until creamy
Serve immediately with black pepper

recipes.title: Spicy Grilled Chicken
instructions: Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces and marinate with spices for at least 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a large skillet and cook marinated chicken until browned and cooked through.
Remove chicken and set aside. In the same pan, sauté diced onion until softened.
Add minced garlic and herbs, cook for another minute until fragrant.
Add seasoning and simmer for 10 minutes until sauce thickens.
Return chicken to the pan and toss to combine.
Simmer for 5-10 minutes until heated through and flavors combine.
Serve hot with rice and bread.

recipes.title: Creamy Butter Chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken in spices overnight
Cook chicken until golden brown
Prepare rich tomato-butter sauce
Simmer chicken in sauce
Finish with cream and serve with bread

recipes.title: Spiced Rice Bowl
instructions: Soak rice for 30 minutes
Marinate meat with spices
Cook rice until 70% done
Layer rice and meat alternately
Cook on dum for 45 minutes
Serve with raita and shorba

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
instructions: Wash and chop romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
Place lettuce in a large salad bowl.
Add croutons and grated Parmesan cheese.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing and toss well.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
instructions: Brown ground beef in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add taco seasoning and cook according to package instructions.
Warm taco shells in the oven or microwave.
Prepare toppings: shred lettuce, dice tomatoes, grate cheese.
Fill taco shells with beef and desired toppings.
Serve with sour cream and salsa.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cream together butter and both sugars until light and fluffy.
Beat in eggs one at a time, then add vanilla.
Gradually mix in flour, baking soda, and salt.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 9-11 minutes until golden brown.
Cool on baking sheet for 2 minutes before transferring to wire rack.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
instructions: Cut cucumbers and tomatoes into chunks.
Slice red onion thinly.
Combine vegetables in a large bowl.
Add olives and crumbled feta cheese.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Season with salt, pepper, and oregano.
Toss gently and serve immediately.

recipes.title: Grilled Salmon
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat
Season salmon with salt and pepper
Brush with olive oil and minced garlic
Grill for 4-5 minutes per side
Serve with fresh lemon slices

recipes.title: Quinoa Buddha Bowl
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions
Roast sweet potato cubes at 400°F for 25 minutes
Drain and rinse chickpeas
Assemble bowl with quinoa, vegetables, and avocado
Drizzle with tahini dressing

recipes.title: Christmas Turkey
instructions: Preheat oven to 325°F
Prepare herb butter with fresh rosemary and thyme
Stuff turkey cavity with orange and herbs
Rub herb butter under and over skin
Roast for 3-4 hours until internal temp reaches 165°F

recipes.title: Pumpkin Spice Latte
instructions: Heat milk in a saucepan
Whisk in pumpkin puree and spices
Froth the milk mixture
Pour coffee into mugs
Top with spiced pumpkin milk foam

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast bread until golden brown
Mash avocado with fork
Spread avocado on toast
Top with halved cherry tomatoes
Sprinkle with sea salt and black pepper

recipes.title: Sambar
instructions: Cook toor dal in pressure cooker until soft and mushy
Extract tamarind juice and boil with vegetables
Add cooked dal and sambar powder
Simmer until vegetables are tender
Temper with mustard seeds, curry leaves in oil
Add tempering to sambar and simmer for 10 minutes
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve hot

recipes.title: Rasam
instructions: Boil chopped tomatoes until soft and mash well
Add tamarind juice, rasam powder and turmeric
Add salt and jaggery, bring to boil
In a pan, roast cumin and pepper, powder it
Add the powder to rasam and simmer
Temper with ghee, mustard seeds and curry leaves
Garnish with coriander and serve hot

recipes.title: Curd Rice (Thayir Sadam)
instructions: Mash cooked rice when slightly warm
Add curd and milk, mix well
Add salt and chopped ginger, green chilies
Heat oil, add mustard seeds and urad dal
When they splutter, add curry leaves
Pour tempering over curd rice
Garnish with pomegranate seeds and serve

recipes.title: Lemon Rice
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds
Add chana dal, urad dal and let them brown
Add peanuts, red chilies and curry leaves
Add turmeric powder and cooked rice
Mix gently without breaking rice grains
Add salt and fresh lemon juice
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve

recipes.title: Idli
instructions: Soak rice and urad dal separately for 4-6 hours
Grind urad dal to smooth fluffy batter
Grind rice to slightly coarse batter
Mix both batters, add salt and ferment 8-10 hours
Grease idli molds with oil
Pour batter into molds and steam for 10-12 minutes
Serve hot with sambar and chutney

recipes.title: Dosa
instructions: Heat non-stick tawa on medium flame
Pour a ladle of batter in center
Spread in circular motion to make thin crepe
Drizzle oil around edges
Cook until bottom turns golden brown
Fold and remove from tawa
Serve hot with sambar and coconut chutney

recipes.title: Chicken Chettinad
instructions: Dry roast coconut, poppy seeds, fennel, coriander seeds and red chilies
Grind to fine paste with little water
Marinate chicken with turmeric, salt for 30 minutes
Heat oil, fry chicken pieces until half cooked
In same oil, sauté onions until golden
Add tomatoes and ground spice paste
Add chicken and cook covered for 20 minutes
Garnish with curry leaves and serve hot

recipes.title: Murukku
instructions: Mix rice flour, urad dal flour, salt, asafoetida
Add cumin seeds, sesame seeds and melted butter
Add water gradually to make smooth dough
Fill murukku maker with dough
Heat oil for deep frying
Press murukku in spiral shape directly into hot oil
Fry until golden and crisp
Store in airtight container when cool

recipes.title: Mysore Pak
instructions: Roast besan in 2 tbsp ghee until aromatic
Make sugar syrup with water until one string consistency
Add roasted besan to syrup, mix continuously
Add remaining ghee little by little while stirring
Cook until mixture leaves pan sides
Add cardamom powder and mix
Pour into greased tray and cut when cool
Store in airtight container

recipes.title: Filter Coffee
instructions: Add coffee powder to filter top compartment
Pour hot water over coffee powder
Let it drip slowly for 10-15 minutes
Boil milk with sugar in a pot
Mix 2-3 tbsp coffee decoction with hot milk
Pour from height between two tumblers for froth
Serve hot in traditional steel tumbler and davara

recipes.title: Vada (Medu Vada)
instructions: Soak urad dal for 3-4 hours, drain completely
Grind to fluffy batter without adding water
Add salt, chopped chilies, ginger, curry leaves
Add asafoetida and mix well
Heat oil for deep frying
Wet hands, take batter and shape into donut with hole
Fry until golden brown and crispy
Serve hot with sambar and coconut chutney

recipes.title: Vegetable Biryani
instructions: Soak saffron in warm milk
Parboil rice with whole spices until 70% cooked
Marinate vegetables with yogurt and biryani masala
Cook marinated vegetables until tender
Layer rice and vegetables alternately
Sprinkle fried onions, mint, saffron milk
Cover and cook on dum for 45 minutes
Serve with raita and boiled eggs

recipes.title: Tamarind Rice (Puli Sadam)
instructions: Heat sesame oil, add mustard seeds
Add peanuts, red chilies, curry leaves
Add tamarind paste and cook for 2 minutes
Add jaggery, sambar powder and salt
Cook until thick consistency
Add cooked rice and mix gently
Cook for 5 minutes on low heat
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve

recipes.title: Coconut Rice
instructions: Grind coconut, green chilies, ginger to coarse paste
Heat oil, add mustard seeds
Add urad dal, chana dal, let them brown
Add cashews and curry leaves
Add ground coconut paste and salt
Add cooked rice and mix gently
Cook for 5 minutes until well combined
Serve warm or at room temperature

recipes.title: Pongal (Ven Pongal)
instructions: Dry roast rice and moong dal separately
Boil water, add roasted rice and dal
Cook until soft and mushy like khichdi
Heat ghee, add cumin seeds and black pepper
Add chopped ginger and cashews
When cashews turn golden, add curry leaves
Pour this tempering over cooked pongal
Mix well, add salt and serve hot

recipes.title: Beans Poriyal
instructions: Cut beans into small pieces
Grate coconut and keep aside
Heat oil, add mustard seeds and urad dal
Add green chilies and curry leaves
Add beans, turmeric and salt
Cover and cook until beans are tender
Add grated coconut and mix
Cook for 2 minutes and serve hot

recipes.title: Jigarthanda
instructions: Soak badam pisin in water for 2 hours
Boil china grass in water until dissolved
Boil milk with sugar until thick
Add dissolved china grass to milk
Cool and refrigerate until set
Blend half the set mixture with ice
Layer with ice cream, almonds, nannari syrup
Serve chilled in tall glasses

recipes.title: Lemon Rice
instructions: Heat oil in a pan
Add mustard seeds and let them splutter
Add curry leaves and green chilies
Add turmeric powder and mix
Add cooked rice and salt
Mix gently without breaking rice
Add lemon juice and mix well
Serve hot or at room temperature

recipes.title: Tamarind Rice (Puli Sadam)
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a heavy-bottomed pan
Add mustard seeds and fenugreek seeds
Add red chilies and curry leaves
Add tamarind paste and cook for 2 minutes
Add sambar powder and jaggery
Add salt and cook until thick
Add cooked rice and mix gently
Let it rest for 30 minutes before serving

recipes.title: Coconut Rice
instructions: Heat oil in a pan
Add mustard seeds, urad dal, chana dal
Add green chilies and curry leaves
Add grated coconut and salt
Saute for 2-3 minutes
Add cooked rice and mix gently
Garnish with more coconut
Serve warm

recipes.title: Tomato Rice
instructions: Cook rice with salt and keep aside
Heat oil and saute onions until golden
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook
Add chopped tomatoes and spices
Cook until tomatoes are mushy
Add cooked rice and mix gently
Garnish with coriander leaves
Serve hot

recipes.title: Vegetable Biryani
instructions: Soak rice for 30 minutes
Cook vegetables with biryani masala
Mix yogurt with fried onions
Parboil rice with whole spices
Layer rice and vegetables alternately
Top with mint, coriander, saffron
Cook on dum for 45 minutes
Serve with raita and pickle

recipes.title: Chicken Biryani
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for 2 hours
Cook marinated chicken until tender
Soak rice for 30 minutes
Parboil rice with whole spices
Layer chicken and rice alternately
Top with fried onions, mint, coriander
Cook on dum for 1 hour
Serve hot with boiled eggs and raita

recipes.title: Mutton Biryani
instructions: Marinate mutton with yogurt and spices overnight
Pressure cook mutton until tender
Soak rice for 45 minutes
Parboil rice with whole spices
Layer mutton and rice in heavy-bottomed pot
Top with saffron soaked in warm milk
Cook on dum for 1.5 hours
Serve with shorba and pickle

recipes.title: Fish Biryani
instructions: Marinate fish with turmeric and salt
Shallow fry fish pieces until golden
Cook rice with whole spices
Prepare masala with onions and spices
Layer rice and fish alternately
Top with herbs and fried onions
Cook on dum for 30 minutes
Serve with cucumber raita

recipes.title: Curd Semiya
instructions: Roast vermicelli until golden
Cook vermicelli in boiling water
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add urad dal, green chilies, curry leaves
Mix cooked vermicelli with seasoning
Add beaten yogurt and salt
Garnish with coriander leaves
Serve chilled

recipes.title: Pongal (Ven Pongal)
instructions: Pressure cook rice and dal together
Heat ghee in a pan
Add cumin, pepper, ginger, curry leaves
Add cashews and fry until golden
Add cooked rice-dal mixture
Mix well and add salt
Cook for 5 minutes
Serve hot with sambar and chutney

recipes.title: Vada (Medu Vada)
instructions: Soak urad dal for 4 hours
Grind to smooth fluffy batter
Add green chilies, ginger, curry leaves
Add salt and asafoetida
Heat oil for deep frying
Shape batter into donuts and fry
Fry until golden brown
Serve hot with sambar and chutney

recipes.title: Masala Dosa
instructions: Boil and mash potatoes
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add onions, green chilies, curry leaves
Add turmeric and mashed potatoes
Heat dosa pan and spread batter
Add potato filling in center
Fold dosa and serve hot
Serve with sambar and chutneys

recipes.title: Rava Dosa
instructions: Mix rava, rice flour, and maida
Add water to make thin batter
Add cumin, green chilies, ginger
Add curry leaves and salt
Let batter rest for 30 minutes
Heat dosa pan with oil
Pour batter and spread quickly
Cook until crispy and serve hot

recipes.title: Onion Uthappam
instructions: Heat uthappam pan with oil
Pour thick dosa batter
Spread to form thick pancake
Sprinkle onions, tomatoes, chilies
Press gently into batter
Cook until bottom is golden
Flip and cook other side
Serve hot with sambar and chutney

recipes.title: Kal Dosa
instructions: Heat cast iron pan well
Mix batter with onions and chilies
Pour thick layer of batter
Add oil around edges
Cook on high heat until crispy
Fold and serve immediately
Serve with coconut chutney
Best enjoyed hot and crispy

recipes.title: Kari Dosa (Madurai special)
instructions: Heat dosa pan with ghee
Spread dosa batter thin
Add pre-cooked mutton curry
Sprinkle onions and coriander
Cook until edges are crispy
Fold and serve hot
Serve with spicy chutney
Popular street food of Madurai

recipes.title: Appam
instructions: Soak raw rice for 4 hours
Grind rice with coconut and cooked rice
Add yeast and sugar to batter
Ferment overnight
Heat appam pan
Pour batter and swirl to coat
Cover and cook until edges are golden
Serve with stew or coconut milk

recipes.title: Idiappam (String Hoppers)
instructions: Boil water with salt and oil
Add rice flour gradually while stirring
Cook until mixture forms dough
Cool slightly and knead
Press through idiappam maker
Steam for 10-15 minutes
Serve hot with coconut
Serve with curry or sweetened coconut milk

recipes.title: Puttu (Rice Puttu)
instructions: Mix rice flour with salt
Sprinkle water to moisten flour
Rub flour until it forms breadcrumbs
Layer flour and coconut in puttu maker
Steam for 15-20 minutes
Remove carefully from mold
Serve hot with banana
Serve with jaggery or curry

recipes.title: Adai (Lentil Crepe)
instructions: Soak rice and dals for 3 hours
Grind coarsely with red chilies
Add asafoetida and curry leaves
Add salt and mix well
Heat pan and spread batter thick
Drizzle oil around edges
Cook until golden brown
Serve with avial or jaggery

recipes.title: Mutton Kuzhambu
instructions: Pressure cook mutton with onions
Dry roast spices and coconut
Grind roasted spices to paste
Heat oil and add ground paste
Add tomatoes and cook until mushy
Add cooked mutton with stock
Simmer until thick gravy forms
Garnish with coriander and serve

recipes.title: Nandu Kuzhambu (Crab Curry)
instructions: Clean and cut crab into pieces
Extract tamarind juice
Heat coconut oil in heavy pan
Add onions and cook until golden
Add tomatoes and sambar powder
Add tamarind juice and turmeric
Add crab pieces and cook covered
Simmer until crab is cooked through

recipes.title: Meen Kuzhambu (Fish Curry)
instructions: Marinate fish with turmeric and salt
Extract thick tamarind juice
Heat oil and fry fish lightly
Remove fish and keep aside
In same oil, add onions and tomato
Add sambar powder and tamarind juice
Boil until oil separates
Add fish and simmer for 5 minutes

recipes.title: Kozhi Milagu Kuzhambu (Pepper Chicken Curry)
instructions: Cut chicken into medium pieces
Dry roast pepper, fennel, poppy seeds
Grind with coconut to fine paste
Marinate chicken with turmeric
Heat oil and fry chicken until golden
Add onions and ginger-garlic paste
Add ground paste and cook well
Add water and simmer until thick

recipes.title: Vatha Kuzhambu
instructions: Cut vegetables into small pieces
Extract thick tamarind water
Heat sesame oil and add mustard seeds
Add vegetables and fry well
Add sambar powder and turmeric
Add tamarind water and salt
Boil until vegetables are cooked
Simmer until oil floats on top

recipes.title: Kara Kuzhambu
instructions: Dry roast red chilies and coriander
Grind with coconut to paste
Extract tamarind juice
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add vegetables and cook partially
Add ground paste and turmeric
Add tamarind juice and boil
Cook until vegetables are tender

recipes.title: Puli Kuzhambu
instructions: Extract thick tamarind juice
Cut vegetables into pieces
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add vegetables and saute
Add tamarind juice and bring to boil
Add sambar powder and turmeric
Add jaggery and salt
Cook until vegetables are done

recipes.title: Mor Kuzhambu (Curd Curry)
instructions: Grind coconut with green chilies and ginger
Beat yogurt and mix with ground paste
Cut vegetables into small pieces
Cook vegetables with little water
Add yogurt mixture to cooked vegetables
Heat on low flame without boiling
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Pour tempering over curry and serve

recipes.title: Kadalai Kuzhambu (Chickpea Curry)
instructions: Soak chickpeas overnight and pressure cook
Roast coconut, red chilies, coriander
Grind to smooth paste
Heat oil and saute onions
Add tomato and cook until soft
Add ground paste and cook
Add cooked chickpeas with water
Add tamarind juice and simmer

recipes.title: Kuzhi Paniyaram
instructions: Heat oil in each cavity of paniyaram pan
Add mustard seeds and let them splutter
Add onions, green chilies, ginger, curry leaves
Pour batter into each cavity
Cook on medium heat until golden
Turn each paniyaram using a skewer
Cook until both sides are golden
Serve hot with chutney

recipes.title: Upma (Rava Upma)
instructions: Dry roast semolina until aromatic
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add green chilies, ginger, curry leaves
Add onions and saute until translucent
Add water and bring to boil
Slowly add roasted semolina while stirring
Cook until water is absorbed
Serve hot with coconut chutney

recipes.title: Thattai
instructions: Mix all dry ingredients except oil
Add hot oil (2 tbsp) to the flour mixture
Add water gradually to form stiff dough
Add curry leaves and sesame seeds
Make small balls and flatten into discs
Heat oil for deep frying
Fry thattai until golden and crispy
Store in airtight container

recipes.title: Seedai (Uppu Seedai & Vella Seedai)
instructions: Dry roast rice flour until aromatic
Mix urad dal flour and coconut
For sweet version, melt jaggery with little water
For savory version, use salt and cumin
Mix all ingredients with hot ghee
Add liquid gradually to form tight dough
Shape into small balls
Deep fry until golden and puffed

recipes.title: Mixture
instructions: Mix gram flour, rice flour with spices
Add water to make thick batter
Heat oil for deep frying
Make sev using sev maker
Fry peanuts and cashews separately
Fry curry leaves until crispy
Mix all fried components together
Store in airtight container

recipes.title: Mysore Pak
instructions: Roast gram flour in 2 tbsp ghee until aromatic
Make sugar syrup with water
Add roasted flour to hot syrup
Keep stirring continuously
Add remaining ghee gradually
Cook until mixture leaves the pan
Pour into greased tray
Cut into squares when warm

recipes.title: Jangiri
instructions: Soak urad dal for 4 hours
Grind to smooth fluffy batter
Make sugar syrup of one string consistency
Add cardamom and color to syrup
Heat oil for frying
Pipe batter in spiral shape and fry
Fry until golden and crispy
Dip hot jangiri in warm syrup

recipes.title: Paal Payasam
instructions: Wash and pressure cook rice until very soft
Mash rice to smooth paste
Boil milk in heavy-bottomed pan
Add mashed rice and cook
Stir continuously to avoid lumps
Add sugar and cardamom
Fry cashews and raisins in ghee
Garnish payasam and serve warm

recipes.title: Semiya Payasam
instructions: Roast vermicelli in ghee until golden
Boil milk in a heavy pan
Add roasted vermicelli to milk
Cook until vermicelli is soft
Add sugar and cardamom
Fry cashews and raisins in ghee
Add to payasam and mix
Serve warm or chilled

recipes.title: Rava Kesari
instructions: Roast semolina in 2 tbsp ghee until aromatic
Boil water with food color
Add roasted semolina slowly while stirring
Cook until water is absorbed
Add sugar and mix well
Add remaining ghee gradually
Fry cashews and raisins separately
Garnish kesari and serve hot

recipes.title: Sweet Pongal (Sakkarai Pongal)
instructions: Pressure cook rice and dal with milk
Mash the cooked rice-dal mixture
Melt jaggery with little water
Strain to remove impurities
Add jaggery syrup to rice mixture
Cook on low heat stirring continuously
Add ghee gradually
Fry cashews, raisins and add to pongal
